sentences: We appreciate your interest in joining BCG X
Ventures (Formerly BCG Digital Ventures)
Please note: this is not a job posting
You are welcome to submit your interest in being considered below; we will keep you in mind once we open a role that matches the job description
We’re Building Tomorrow
BCG X is the tech build and design unit of BCG
At BCG X
Ventures (formerly BCG Digital Ventures) we apply an end-to-end approach to build and launch standalone and new core businesses

We turn differentiated assets into strategic advantages that unlock growth, building everything needed—products and technology, business models and go-to-market strategies, and operations and organization foundations—to launch these projects at speed
Engineering at BCG X
Ventures
Our multidisciplinary engineering team tackles challenges at their core
From product and test engineers to full stack engineers and data scientists, these venture builders all share a passion for innovative and emerging digital solutions

Working in collaboration with product and design teams, they use cutting-edge and custom technologies to imagine, build and launch breakthrough digital businesses that disrupt markets and generate untold value for businesses and consumers alike
Engineers will:
Shape innovative products and businesses that address real user frictions
Write clean, functional code
Build new products 0-1
Manage the complete development lifecycle of a website or application, from architectural design to rollout
Work in a diverse, collaborative, and dynamic environment where everyone's ideas are valued
Give input into the product direction and be involved in the discussions around shaping the product roadmap
You should have:
Strong hands-on development experience
Real passion for solving customer frictions through simple and effective software
Strong people skills that contribute to an diverse and collaborative environment
Knowledge of clean coding practices, including object-oriented and functional programming concepts
Exposure to Agile, Lean, and Continuous Delivery approaches, such as Continuous Integration, TDD, Infrastructure as Code etc
Experience in communicating ideas and decisions to a variety of team members and clients
Languages / Frameworks
FE: TypeScript, Vue
js, React/React Native, Angular, Flutter
BE: Kotlin, Python, Typescript, Node
js, Go
APIs
GraphQL, REST APIs, Stream APIs
Infrastructure
Docker, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Azure Framework, Serverless
Benefits at BCG X
At BCG we are committed to offering a competitive compensation package and benefits that contribute to our employee’s quality of life
We offer a base salary, annual bonus, and fully vested retirement plan with annual contributions
We pay the full cost of medical, dental, and vision coverage for our employees and their eligible loved ones
We offer reimbursement for gym memberships and other fitness activities and paid time off including vacation
Diversity & Inclusion at BCG X
Ventures
BCG X
Ventures facilitates a sense of belonging where all employees, particularly those historically at the margins of society, can unapologetically bring authenticity to their work
To learn more, visit us at https://bcg
com/x
